website_summaries.verdict: An interesting alternative to traditional Jenga blocks, but with the same game play as the original. We find the national parks trivia very entertaining, but some may question the higher price point. Better construction than modern plastic knock-offs.
pros: Wooden blocks have the same high quality finish and weight as original Jenga pieces
National parks information can be very educational for younger players
cons: More expensive than other Jenga-inspired sets
Blocks contain factoids on national parks, but player interest may be variable

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Our national parks are an incredibly valuable asset. I want the kids in my family to understand how important they are, and was surprised to see this edition of Jenga available.Same great quality as regular pieces. Jenga is a perfect game for children and adults to play together, and the fact that this promotes our national parks was a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Irish4TW

customer_reviews.title: Support the National Parks and have fun at the same time!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Blocks are uniform and smooth unlike some of the off brand products. I dont know if spending the extra money for the national parks is worth it for the game - but it is a nice feel good moment for the support of our National parks. Would be cool if these blocks were biodegradable. But it is better than plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Eric K

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are fun facts on BOTH sides of ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that there are fun facts on BOTH sides of the block. It extends the fun of the game!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Fun and unique!
customer_reviews.text: I work for the NPS and we do a basket drawing every year at the holidays for our Employee's Association. Each division donates $ and puts a basket together and employees can buy tickets for the drawings. This went into my division's basket this year and it's perfect - fun, unique, good for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: C. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Nice Details
customer_reviews.text: Just like any other Jenga game with the exception that it's branded by the National Parks Foundation with random parks facts. The facts are interesting, however if you're used to fast game play, you may not care to read out the facts when playing. The text is pretty clear and looks like it's been placed with a branding iron and burned into the wood. This version also does not have the plastic stacking sleeve like older versions of Jenga once had, just the ordinary, flimsy cardstock sleeve like in all the newer versions. However, the box is at least square, unlike the classic version that is now being sold in a rectangle box for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Chow

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: So much Fun! Love the facts! And the loser is instructed to sing "This land is your land". :)
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ADDITION TO MY GAMES
customer_reviews.text: I LEARNED SO MUCH. I LOVE TO HAVE FUN AND BE EDUCATED IN THE PROCESS
customer_reviews.author: Golden E

customer_reviews.title: They had never played the game before so had fun learning Jenga while learning all sorts of fun facts ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this edition for a National Park lover for Christmas. They had never played the game before so had fun learning Jenga while learning all sorts of fun facts about parks they intend to visit.
customer_reviews.author: Lori V.

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!  Love this game.  Great idea for Jenga.
customer_reviews.text: We play this all the time and learn at the same time! Love it.
customer_reviews.author: LS DeBella

customer_reviews.title: Item was a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for Christmas. It has not been opened or used.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D Ensor

customer_reviews.title: These are the same as the less expensive ones all ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the same as the less expensive ones all over Amazon but with factoids of National Parks printed on the blocks. Once you read a block do you need to read it again? I suppose I bought these thinking I was supporting the National Park Service, but in hindsight I spent twice as much as I needed to for the exact same game. You choose.
customer_reviews.author: David Theis

customer_reviews.title: Jenga jenga jenga
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! What a great way to mix up a classic game!
customer_reviews.author: JustJen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a cool set with lots of fun facts about parks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Version!
customer_reviews.text: Love this Jenga set! Very cool version, neat facts about our National Parks-great for the trivia lover! :)
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love the national parks and I love Jenga. This is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen LW

customer_reviews.title: Cut down trees to make Janga blocks. Seriously?
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even with this. Seriously? National Parks themed wooden blocks. Isn’t the whole point to save trees? Not cut them down to make oddly themed toys?
customer_reviews.author: etpc

product_meta.title: USAOPOLY JENGA National Parks | Classic Jenga Wooden Block Game with a National Parks Theme | Perfect Travel Game for Families | Celebrate US National Parks Service
product_meta.description: Celebrate America's national parks while you play Jenga, the classic block stacking game. Players remove and stack custom blocks, each featuring a fun fact about the national parks.
feature_bullets: It's the classic Jenga game with a National Parks twist - pull out a block without crashing the stack to win at Jenga
Includes 54 Jenga hardwood blocks with over 100 educational National Parks facts and trivia
Celebrate America's national treasures - from Yellowstone to the Grand Canyon, and every National Park in-between, learn about the amazing history and wonder of these parks
Support the National Park Service - proceeds benefit National Park Foundation

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
